dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Automotive aluminum body; Car aluminum chassis; Aluminum vehicle frame; Auto body aluminum
Automotive aluminum body; Car aluminum chassis; Aluminum vehicle frame; Auto body aluminum
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow describes a primary aluminum alloy used for creating a body-in-white. This denotes a stage in automotive design or manufacturing where the car body sheet metal has been assembled but before painting occurs. The processing level involves casting and forming of the alloy. It ensures technical compliance with industry standards, has high quality, and the usage information pertains to the automotive industry. Production route begins with the extraction of bauxite, followed by the Bayer process for alumina production, and subsequent electrolysis for aluminum, ending with alloying and forming. The educt name includes bauxite, alumina. The aluminum alloy body-in-white is part of a production mix and is available 'at plant', prior to distribution or assembly into vehicles.

产品流描述了用于制造汽车白车身的初级铝合金。这表示汽车设计或制造中的一个阶段，即车身钣金已经组装但尚未进行喷漆。加工级别包括铝合金的铸造和成型。它确保了符合行业标准的技术合规性，具有高品质，使用信息适用于汽车行业。生产路线始于铝土矿的提取，接着是拜耳法生产氧化铝，随后是电解制取铝，最后是合金化和成型。原料名称包括铝土矿、氧化铝。铝合金白车身是生产混合物的一部分，并且是在工厂内提供的，此时还未进行车辆分配或组装。
